scripts.base-test-unit: if test $npm_config_t = true ; then npm run transpile; fi && cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 mocha --loader=babel-register-esm
scripts.test-with-coverage: c8 -n src -r html cross-env npm run test-unit
scripts.test-with-coverage_lcov: c8 -n src --reporter=lcov cross-env npm run test-unit && copyfiles -f "./coverage/tmp/*.json" "../../coverage/tmp"
scripts.bump: if [ -z $npm_config_level ]; then grunt bump:minor;  else grunt bump:$npm_config_level; fi
